newsitem.title: UK: ICCO seeks bids for 4,250 tonnes of cocoa.
newsitem.headline: ICCO seeks bids for 4,250 tonnes of cocoa.

text.p: The International Cocoa Organization (ICCO) said it was seeking bids by 1240 GMT on Monday to buy 4,250 tonnes of its buffer stock cocoa.
The buffer stock manager said in a statement the cocoa for sale related to the list published on October 25.
The statement said the ICCO would communicate with the successful bidders by 1400 GMT.
